solution_line_template: For the fourth-grade classes, Jessa needs {num_fourth_grade_classes} classes * {students_per_fourth_grade_class} cupcakes/class = <<{num_fourth_grade_classes}*{students_per_fourth_grade_class}={cupcakes_for_fourth_grade}>>{cupcakes_for_fourth_grade} cupcakes

Adding the cupcakes for the P.E. class {cupcakes_for_pe_class}, she needs to make a total of {cupcakes_for_fourth_grade} cupcakes + {cupcakes_for_pe_class} cupcakes = <<{cupcakes_for_fourth_grade}+{cupcakes_for_pe_class}={total_cupcakes}>>{total_cupcakes} cupcakes
